(solution 
(:objects satellite0 -  satellite satellite1 -  satellite instrument1 -  instrument instrument2 -  instrument infrared0 -  mode infrared1 -  mode thermograph2 -  mode instrument0 -  instrument groundstation1 -  direction star0 -  direction star2 -  direction planet3 -  direction star4 -  direction planet5 -  direction star6 -  direction star7 -  direction phenomenon8 -  direction phenomenon9 -  direction )
(:init (supports instrument2 thermograph2) (on-board instrument1 satellite1) (pointing satellite1 star0) (calibration-target instrument0 star0) (supports instrument2 infrared1) (supports instrument0 thermograph2) (pointing satellite0 star6) (supports instrument1 thermograph2) (on-board instrument0 satellite0) (on-board instrument2 satellite1) (power-avail satellite0) (supports instrument1 infrared1) (supports instrument0 infrared0) (calibration-target instrument2 star2) (power-avail satellite1) (calibration-target instrument1 star2) (supports instrument1 infrared0))

(:observations (supports instrument2 thermograph2) (on-board instrument1 satellite1) (pointing satellite1 star0) (calibration-target instrument0 star0) (supports instrument2 infrared1) (supports instrument0 thermograph2) (pointing satellite0 star6) (supports instrument1 thermograph2) (on-board instrument0 satellite0) (on-board instrument2 satellite1) (power-avail satellite0) (supports instrument1 infrared1) (supports instrument0 infrared0) (calibration-target instrument2 star2) (power-avail satellite1) (calibration-target instrument1 star2) (supports instrument1 infrared0))

(turn-to satellite1 star2 star0)

(:observations (supports instrument2 thermograph2) (on-board instrument1 satellite1) (calibration-target instrument0 star0) (supports instrument2 infrared1) (supports instrument0 thermograph2) (pointing satellite0 star6) (supports instrument1 thermograph2) (on-board instrument0 satellite0) (on-board instrument2 satellite1) (power-avail satellite0) (supports instrument1 infrared1) (supports instrument0 infrared0) (calibration-target instrument2 star2) (power-avail satellite1) (calibration-target instrument1 star2) (supports instrument1 infrared0) (pointing satellite1 star2))

(turn-to satellite0 star0 star6)

(:observations (supports instrument2 thermograph2) (on-board instrument1 satellite1) (calibration-target instrument0 star0) (supports instrument2 infrared1) (supports instrument0 thermograph2) (supports instrument1 thermograph2) (on-board instrument0 satellite0) (on-board instrument2 satellite1) (power-avail satellite0) (supports instrument1 infrared1) (supports instrument0 infrared0) (calibration-target instrument2 star2) (power-avail satellite1) (calibration-target instrument1 star2) (supports instrument1 infrared0) (pointing satellite1 star2) (pointing satellite0 star0))

(switch-on instrument2 satellite1)

(:goal (supports instrument2 thermograph2) (on-board instrument1 satellite1) (calibration-target instrument0 star0) (supports instrument2 infrared1) (supports instrument0 thermograph2) (supports instrument1 thermograph2) (on-board instrument0 satellite0) (on-board instrument2 satellite1) (power-avail satellite0) (supports instrument1 infrared1) (supports instrument0 infrared0) (calibration-target instrument2 star2) (calibration-target instrument1 star2) (supports instrument1 infrared0) (pointing satellite1 star2) (pointing satellite0 star0) (power-on instrument2)))
